ev_intro.title: Introduction
ev_intro.description: Welcome to Oochamon! Your journey starts here.

ev_intro.title: Introduction
ev_intro.description:
Please, feel free to pick an Oochamon to begin with. Any will do!
This image of the Oochamon we found is a placeholder, by the way. We're still developing our actual picture!

ev_intro.title: Introduction
ev_intro.description: Great choice! Your Oochamon will love you, I'm sure.

ev_intro.title: Introduction
ev_intro.description: Get out there and go have some fun. The head researcher would like to speak with you, so start there!

ev_intro.title: Quick Tutorial
ev_intro.description:
Here's a quick tutorial on how to play Oochamon!
To move, type `w` `a` `s` or `d` in the chat, and send it as a message. You can use a number after the direction, or something like "www" or "ssss" to jump up to 6 tiles in one direction.
If you want to chain together these, you can do something like this: `w4,d4` to do 2 movement actions at once.
You can type `/menu` as well to pull up the in game menu!
You can use `/teleport` to teleport between the hub and your current checkpoint, to help you access the shop easier!
Lastly, you can use `/lookup` to get a description of what a move or ability does, or use it to view the type matchup table or the controls at any time!

If you have any questions, please ask Pines or Jeff!
